params.page_about1: Hi I am Sid founder of Throttlerz Inc. A better Blogger experience on the web May 20, 2020. Since 1999, millions of people have expressed themselves on Blogger.  the ability to easily share, publish and express oneself on the web is at the core of Blogger mission. As the web constantly evolves, we want to ensure anyone using Blogger has an easy and intuitive experience publishing their content to the web.
params.page_about2: That is why we have been slowly introducing an improved web experience for Blogger. Give the fresh interface a spin by clicking in the right-hand navigation pane.
